Classes

Session Class

class asyncnt.Session(*, rate: int = 10, limit_for: Union[float, int] = 1, cache_for: Union[float, int] = 300, cache_maxsize: int = 128)

First-class interface for making HTTP requests to Nitro Type.

Parameters

  • rate (int) – The number of tokens available per asyncnt.Session.limit_for seconds. Defaults to 10.

  • limit_for (Union[float, int]) – The length of the rate limit in seconds. If 0, there is no rate limit. Defaults to 1.

  • cache_for (Union[float, int]) – The amount of time in seconds to cache results for. If 0, results will not be cached. Defaults to 300.

  • cache_maxsize (int) – The maximum size of the cache. If 0, results will not be cached. Defaults to 128.

Raises

asyncnt.InvalidArgument – One of the arguments provided is invalid.

async get(url: str) → Optional[aiohttp.client_reqrep.ClientResponse]

Gets data from Nitro Type.

Parameters

url (str) – The url to get data from.

Raises

asyncnt.HTTPException – Getting the data failed.

Returns

The data from the url.

Return type

Optional[aiohttp.ClientResponse]

async get_boostrap() → aiohttp.client_reqrep.ClientResponse

A shortcut to getting data from the bootstrap.

Raises

asyncnt.HTTPException – Getting the data failed.

Returns

The boostrap data.

Return type

aiohttp.ClientResponse

async get_car(id: int, *, hue_angle: Optional[int] = None) → Optional[asyncnt.Car]

Get a car with an ID.

Parameters

  • id (int) – The car’s ID.

  • hue_angle (Optional[int]) – The car’s hue angle. Defaults to None.

Raises

  • asyncnt.InvalidID – The ID given is invalid.

  • asyncnt.InvalidArgument – The hue angle provided is invalid.

  • asyncnt.HTTPException – Getting the car failed.

Returns

The car with the given ID.

Return type

Optional[asyncnt.Car]

async get_loot(id: int) → Optional[asyncnt.Loot]

Get loot with an ID. :param id: The loot’s ID. :type id: int :raise asyncnt.InvalidLootID: The ID given is invalid. :raise asyncnt.HTTPException: Getting the loot failed. :return: The loot with the given ID. :rtype: Optional[asyncnt.Loot]

async get_racer(username: str) → Optional[asyncnt.Racer]

Get a racer with a username.

Parameters

username (str) – The racer’s username.

Raises

  • asyncnt.InvalidRacerUsername – The username given is invalid.

  • asyncnt.HTTPException – Getting the racer failed.

Returns

The racer with the given username.

Return type

Optional[asyncnt.Racer]

async get_team(tag: str) → Optional[asyncnt.Team]

Get a team with a tag.

Parameters

tag (str) – The team’s tag.

Raises

  • asyncnt.InvalidTeamTag – The tag given is invalid.

  • asyncnt.HTTPException – Getting the team failed.

Returns

The team with the given tag.

Return type

Optional[asyncnt.Team]

Racer Class

class asyncnt.Racer(data: Dict, *, scraper: asyncnt.Session)

Represents a Nitro Type racer.

id

The racer’s user ID.

username

The racer’s username.

display_name

The racer’s display name.

title

The racer’s current title.

url

The racer’s profile url.

membership

The racer’s membership (gold, basic).

level

The racer’s level.

experience

The racer’s amount of experience.

profile_views

The racer’s amount of profile views.

nitros

The racer’s amount of owned nitros.

nitros_used

The racer’s amount of used nitros.

nitros_total

The racer’s amount of owned and used nitros.

races

The racer’s amount of races.

longest_session

The racer’s longest session.

team_tag

The racer’s team tag. None if the racer has no team.

average_speed

The racer’s average speed.

high_speed

The racer’s highest speed.

friend_reqs_allowed

Whether the racer allows friend requests.

looking_for_team

Whether the racer allows team invites.

created

The racer’s creation time.

cars_owned

The racer’s amount of owned cars.

cars_sold

The racer’s amount of sold cars.

cars_total

The racer’s amount of owned and sold cars.

property raw_car: Dict

The racer’s current car. Note that this gives less information than asyncnt.Racer.get_car().

property raw_cars: List[Dict]

The racer’s cars. Note that this gives less information than asyncnt.Racer.get_cars().

property raw_loot: List[Dict]

The racer’s loot. Note that this gives less information than asyncnt.Racer.get_loot().

property raw_team: Dict

The racer’s team. Note that this gives less information than asyncnt.Racer.get_team().

Returns the team the racer is on.

Raises

asyncnt.HTTPException – Getting the team failed.

Returns

The racer’s team. None if the racer has no team.

Return type

Optional[asyncnt.Team]

Team Class

class asyncnt.Team(data: Dict, *, scraper: asyncnt.Session)

Represents a Nitro Type Team.

id

The team’s ID.

tag

The team’s tag.

name

The team’s name.

color

The team’s color as a hex.

url

The team’s profile url.

open

Whether the team allows new members.

created

The team’s creation time.

profile_views

The team’s amount of profile views.

member_count

The team’s amount of members.

min_level

The team’s minimum level required to join.

min_races

The team’s minimum amount of races required to join.

min_speed

The team’s minimum speed required to join.

description

The team’s description.

daily_races

The team’s daily races.

daily_speed

The team’s daily speed.

daily_accuracy

The team’s daily accuracy.

daily_points

The team’s daily points.

season_races

The team’s season races.

season_speed

The team’s season speed.

season_accuracy

The team’s season accuracy.

season_points

The team’s season points.

all_time_races

The team’s all time races.

all_time_speed

The team’s all time speed.

all_time_accuracy

The team’s all time accuracy.

all_time_points

The team’s all time points.

property raw_captain: Dict

The team’s captain. Note that this gives less information than asyncnt.Team.get_captain().

property raw_leaders: List[Dict]

The team’s leaders. Note that this gives less information than asyncnt.Team.get_leaders().

property raw_members: List[Dict]

The team’s members. Note that this gives less information than asyncnt.Team.get_members().

async get_leaders(self, *, include_captain: bool = False) → List[Optional[asyncnt.Racer]]

Parameters

Raises

asyncnt.HTTPException – Getting the leaders failed.

Returns

The team’s leaders.

Return type

Returns
